nodes.bodyText: @vietj Hi Julien - it looks good, can this base class include provider now ?
yes, but how can we test it ?
I think you can use "jce" as provider to load a jceks file. Although this provider is always present if I'm not mistaken.
ok, I'll have a look, perhaps we can write an integration test with a mock provider that delegates to JCE ?
it is actually used KeyStore.getInstance("JKS").getProvider().getName() that returns the SUN value
